about_the_game:
In a dying world of Magic and Steel, of demons and Dragons, where men are forgotten and women rule over each other with contempt…

A mysterious slave with might beyond anything seen; An obsessed queen who rules with iron fist and deadly magic and the power struggle between them that threatens to destroy the queendom of Liria.

Such is the Legend of the SlaveFighter X.

Inspired by B series sexploitation movies and the retro arcade Beat´em up titles that we all loved to play, SlaveFighter X is a beautifully hand drawn take on the genre, with frame by frame animations, a full graphic novel worth of lewd comic cutscenes and cloths ripping action, the characters clothes will shred as you fight your way through the enemy horde!

FEATURES
• Retro Arcade Beat´em up, kick your way through the enemy ranks, face unique bosses and unleash havoc with your power moves!
• Gorgeous Looking 2d Art, all hand made and frame by frame animated, no shortcuts where taken!
• Rip and Tear!... your enemy clothes; but beware, they will do the same!
• New Skins for you to customize the characters via weekly DLC, COMPLETELY FREE
• BDSM and bondage story driven comics, with more to come in the near future.

content_descriptors.notes: As a B series Sexploitation Story, the narration will lead the player into comic pages cutscenes where some have sugestive images. also while playing the characters lose their clothing leaving them in small underwear.

name: Slave Fighter X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core (2.0 GHZ)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core (3.0 GHZ)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: SlaveFighterX is a 2D side scrolling lewd fantasy Beat´em up, where you fight old school arcade style against hordes of voluptuous enemies and unique bosses while ripping each other’s clothes apart!
